title: Joe Burrow is back, NFL Top 100- Allen vs Mahomes, Packers offense, Saints Spotlight, and Mitchell Schwartz
itunes:title: Joe Burrow is back, NFL Top 100- Allen vs Mahomes, Packers offense, Saints Spotlight, and Mitchell Schwartz
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the next steps for the Bengals. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty discuss the hurdles and possible letdown that Cincinnati will face this season.   The table debates Josh Allen or Patrick Mahomes being higher on the NFL Top 100 before looking at the Packers offense leading into tonight's game vs the Chiefs.  Peter explains why the Saints could be relevant team with all the playmakers they have on their roster.  Throwdown Thursday puts Stefon Diggs vs Tyreek Hill.  Super Bowl Champ Mitchell Schwartz drops by to discuss his retirement and the big stories starting off this season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
